content: Back at the Turtle Island Shrine below where you faced Kang-Jin Star, be sure to explore the left side of the "island" (when facing up toward the turtle's head).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Turtle Island'.
The content is as follows:
Back at the Turtle Island Shrine below where you faced Kang-Jin Star, be sure to explore the left side of the "island" (when facing up toward the turtle's head).
